metadata.title: CVE-2023-3268 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An out of bounds (OOB) memory access flaw was found in the Linux kernel inrelay_file_read_start_pos in kernel/relay.c in the relayfs. This flaw couldallow a local attacker to crash the system or leak kernel internalinformation.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
